## Frequently Asked Questions

### How do I access the workshop materials?

All materials are freely available online.

![](images/qrcode_terojii.github.io.png)

### Who is hosting the workshop?

This workshop has been organized in collaboration with Terkko Health Hub and EstiMates.

### What kind of services does EstiMates provide?

EstiMates offers a range of services including:


1. Statistical Leadership & Planning

- Leading statistical activities in drug development and clinical trials.
- Study design support (e.g., estimands framework, adaptive designs).
- Regulatory interactions, protocols, analysis plans, and sample size calculations.

2. Statistical Reporting & Programming
- Conducting statistical analyses and programming study outputs.
- Post-hoc analyses and manuscript support.
- CDISC standardization, RBM dashboards, and complex data engineering.

3. Data Management
- eCRF and database design, eDiaries integration.
- Regulatory-compliant data handling (e.g., 21 CFR Part 11).
- Medical coding and CDISC standardization.

4. Data Science

Find more about EstiMates [here](https://estimates.fi/).
